document.full_text: german chancellor angela merkel, europe's reluctant paymaster, said on tuesday she could only discuss further aid for greece after eu and imf officials report on implementation of its existing rescue plan.
document.title: eu paymaster merkel guarded on new aid for greece
lines_and_colors: german chancellor angela merkel, europe's reluctant paymaster, said on tuesday she could only discuss further aid for greece after eu and imf officials report on implementation of its existing rescue plan.
